segments.text: The scene is a peculiar mix of domesticity and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm particularly drawn to the boy on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are spread wide, and it looks like it could go at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is stretched so far, reaching deep into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder he hasn't lost his balance already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him doesn't seem to notice the danger of the stool at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on getting a cookie, her palm open in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, he's going to fall hard, and those cookies will be everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him hurting himself makes me feel quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, still polishing her plate, remains completely unaware of this peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly frustrating to see such an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the instability of that climbing stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR
